item.title: iPhone 16 Pro Max and more available at all-time low prices in Vijay Sales' Apple Days Sale - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Vijay Sales' Apple Days Sale Offers Discounts on iPhone 16 Pro Max and More

Publication Date: Jan 03, 2025 02:15 PM IST

Source: Hindustan Times

The Vijay Sales Apple Days sale is currently ongoing, offering significant discounts on various Apple products, including the iPhone 16 Pro Max and MacBook Air M2.

  • The iPhone 16 Pro Max is priced at ₹1,30,650, with additional discounts available through bank offers.
  • The iPhone 16 is selling for ₹70,900, a discount from its original price.
  • The MacBook Air M2 can be purchased for ₹89,890, with potential savings using bank cards.
  • The Apple iPad Air 2024 is on sale for ₹54,499, with additional discounts bringing it close to ₹50,000.
  • The Apple Watch Series 10 is available for roughly ₹43,000 after discounts.
“Note: Vijay Sales Apple Days sale is live until January 5.”

This ongoing sale presents a great opportunity for consumers looking to purchase Apple products at reduced prices.

item.title: Huawei Watch GT5 Pro with ECG monitoring feature launched in India: Details - Business Standard
item.description:
Huawei Launches Watch GT5 Pro with ECG Monitoring in India

Date: October 2023 | Source: Business Standard

The Huawei Watch GT5 Pro, featuring ECG monitoring and various health tracking capabilities, has launched in India. It is available in Black and Titanium editions with a robust design and extensive fitness features.

  • Price for Black edition: Rs 29,999
  • Price for Titanium edition: Rs 39,999
  • Compatible with both iOS and Android
  • Offers up to 14 days battery life
  • Health features include ECG, heart rate tracking, and sleep analysis
  • Over 100 workout modes available
  • IP69 rating for dust and water resistance
“The watch offers an emotional wellness assistant that helps manage stress and mood.”

This smartwatch aims to provide comprehensive health monitoring and fitness tracking for users, making it a significant release in the wearable tech market.

item.title: Capturing The Essence Of Kashmir With The All-New vivo X200 Pro - TRAVEL + LEISURE INDIA
item.description:
Capturing The Essence Of Kashmir With The All-New vivo X200 Pro

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Travel + Leisure Asia

Explore how storyteller Maroof Culmen captured the beauty of Kashmir using the vivo X200 Pro. This smartphone not only serves as a photography tool but also as a narrative device that brings the hidden gems of the valley to life.

  • Culmen utilized various features of the vivo X200 Pro, including Portrait and Street Photography modes, to capture vibrant expressions of local life.
  • The Telephoto HyperZoom mode provided him the capability to focus on distant details, enriching the storytelling aspect of his photography.
  • Long Exposure mode allowed for dynamic shots of waterfalls and landscapes, perfectly showcasing Kashmir's natural beauty.
  • Culmen emphasized the importance of immersion in local culture to create meaningful photography that connects viewers to the region's essence.
“The vivo X200 Pro captures the subtle light changes—the warmth of sunlight filtering through the trees or the coolness of the mountains. It brings every scene to life with vibrant, true-to-nature colours,” - Maroof Culmen.

This innovative smartphone empowers storytellers like Culmen to document their journeys more effectively without the burden of heavy equipment, showcasing the rich tapestry of experiences that places like Kashmir offer.

item.title: GTA 6 Reportedly Expected to Collect Over $1 Billion From Pre-Orders Alone - Gadgets 360
item.description:
GTA 6 Expected to Generate Over $1 Billion in Pre-Orders, Analysts Predict

Publication Date: Not Specified Source: Gadgets360

The article discusses predictions about the sales potential of Grand Theft Auto 6, which analysts believe could generate over $1 billion in pre-orders and $3 billion in its first year of release.

  • GTA 6 could outsell other major titles through pre-orders alone.
  • Analysts at DFC Intelligence expected the game to make over $1 billion in pre-orders.
  • The game is predicted to generate $3.2 billion in its first 12 months.
  • GTA 6 is anticipated to be the biggest entertainment launch in 2025.
  • Rockstar Games aims to meet high public expectations with its release.
“We think it's going to be one of the biggest entertainment launches in history...” - Yoshio Osaki, IDG Consulting Chief

With unmatched anticipation, GTA 6 is expected to break sales records, echoing the success of its predecessor, GTA 5.

item.title: iPhone 17 series to introduce the slimmest device this year: Expected variants, features and price - India TV News
item.description:
iPhone 17 Series to Introduce the Slimmest Device Yet: Features and Pricing

Publication Date: January 2025
Source: India TV News

Apple is gearing up for its major iPhone launch set for September 2025 with the expected iPhone 17 series, which will include four models showcasing innovative designs and enhancements.

Key Points:

  • The iPhone 17 series will feature the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max.
  • Design upgrades include a horizontal camera layout for the standard model and a unique camera positioning for the iPhone 17 Air.
  • All models are expected to include ProMotion technology for 120Hz refresh rates.
  • Performance advancements are anticipated with the A19 chip and varying RAM options across models.
  • The iPhone 17 Air aims to be Apple's thinnest phone yet at 6.25mm thick.
  • Launch is expected in September 2025, with preliminary pricing starting at Rs 79,900 for the standard model.
“The iPhone 17 Air is poised to become Apple’s thinnest smartphone ever.”

Overall, the iPhone 17 series promises significant upgrades and affordability, appealing to a diverse range of users.

item.title: India’s share in global market capitalization eases from all-time high | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
India’s Share in Global Market Capitalization Dips from Peak

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Motilal Oswal Financial Services Ltd.

The last few months of 2024 saw turbulence in global equity markets, leading to a correction in stocks. India’s share in global market capitalization has decreased from 4.6% in August to 4.2% in December.

  • India's market cap share decreased from 4.6% to 4.2%.
  • This decline is attributed to overall turbulence in global equity markets.
  • Analysis by Motilal Oswal indicates a reaction to various economic factors.
"India’s share in global market capitalization has dipped to 4.2% in December from its August peak of 4.6%."

This decline signifies the challenges posed by recent market fluctuations, reflecting the broader trends affecting global equity markets.

item.title: Poco X7 5G, Poco X7 Pro India Launch Set For January 9: From Camera To Display, What We Know So Far - ABP Live
item.description:
Poco X7 5G, Poco X7 Pro India Launch Set For January 9: From Camera To Display, What We Know So Far

Publication Date: January 1, 2024
Source: ABP Live

Poco is set to launch its new X7 5G smartphone series in India, featuring both the Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G on January 9. The phones will be available exclusively on Flipkart, and Poco is actively promoting their design and features on social media.

Don't just meet expectations; Smash them 😈 #POCOX7 Series launching on 9th Jan | 5:30 PM IST on #Flipkart

  • Design: The standard X7 will have a centrally placed camera module, while the Pro will have a pill-shaped array.
  • Camera: Expected 50MP primary cameras and a 20MP selfie camera for the X7.
  • Performance: X7 Pro will likely feature the MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra, while the base variant may use the Dimensity 7300-Ultra.
  • Battery: Pro model might include a 6,000mAh battery with 90W fast charging; standard model expected to have a 5,110mAh battery with 45W charging.
  • Display: The series will feature 6.67-inch AMOLED screens, with high refresh rates and robust protection.

Overall, the upcoming Poco X7 series appears to be a significant addition to the smartphone market, promising impressive features and specifications that cater to modern user needs.

item.title: iPhone SE4 or iPhone 16e? Here is what Apple is likely to launch in 2025 - India Today
item.description:
iPhone SE4 or iPhone 16e? Here is what Apple is likely to launch in 2025

Published On: Jan 3, 2025 | Published By: Divya Bhati

Apple is rumoured to launch a new budget iPhone, possibly named the iPhone 16e, in 2025, instead of the anticipated iPhone SE 4. Key features include an A18 series chip and a brand new modem chip.

  • The iPhone SE 4 has been speculated to be replaced by the iPhone 16e.
  • Rumors point to a launch by late March or early April 2025.
  • The device may feature design improvements such as a larger OLED display, Face ID, and enhanced performance.
  • Significant camera upgrades are expected, including a new 48-megapixel sensor.
  • Pricing in the U.S. could begin around $500, with Indian prices likely ranging from Rs 49,900 to Rs 53,900.
"Only the official launch will confirm whether it will be the iPhone SE 4 or the newly named iPhone 16e." - Divya Bhati

The anticipated upgrades signify Apple's commitment towards enhancing the budget iPhone lineup while aligning it with flagship features.

item.title: iQOO Z9 Turbo Long Battery Life Edition Launched: Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
item.description:
iQOO Z9 Turbo Long Battery Life Edition Launched in China

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Gadgets 360

The iQOO Z9 Turbo Long Battery Life Edition has been officially launched in China, featuring impressive specs like a 6,400mAh battery and advanced camera capabilities.

  • Upgraded variant of iQOO Z9 Turbo
  • Equipped with Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset
  • Features a 50MP dual rear camera system
  • Price starting at CNY 1,899, approximately Rs. 21,000
  • Dual SIM with IP64 dust protection
  • 6,400mAh battery with 80W fast charging
“This version boasts a longer battery life, making it ideal for heavy users.”

The launch of the iQOO Z9 Turbo Long Battery Life Edition is set to compete aggressively in the smartphone market, addressing user needs for durability and performance.

item.title: Massive discount on iPhone 16: Apple's latest iPhone available for under ₹70,000 | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Massive Discount on iPhone 16: Available for Under ₹70,000

Publication Date: October 2023   Source: Live Mint

Apple's latest iPhone 16 is receiving significant discounts, making it more affordable than ever.

Key Points:

  • iPhone 16 launched at ₹79,990 but now discounted to ₹70,990.
  • Available at Vijay Sales with additional bank discounts for specific card users.
  • Features new A18 chipset with 30% faster CPU and 40% faster GPU.
  • Includes new Action Button for various quick tasks.
  • Runs on iOS 18, supporting advanced AI features.
“The iPhone 16 models have a 30% faster CPU and 40% faster GPU than its predecessor.” - Apple

This discount allows more users to access the latest technology features in Apple's iPhone 16.

item.title: Putin's Gaming Ambition Falls Flat: Russian 'Homegrown' Consoles Can't Compete With PS5, Xbox - NDTV
item.description:
Putin's Gaming Ambition Falls Flat: Russian 'Homegrown' Consoles Can't Compete With PS5, Xbox

Date: October 2023
Source: Techspot

A little less than a year after Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered his government to develop gaming consoles, officials have admitted their devices cannot compete with established brands like PlayStation and Xbox. Despite these challenges, the goal remains to promote domestic video game products.

Key Points:

  • Russian gaming consoles are underpowered compared to PS5 and Xbox.
  • One console uses Russia's Elbrus processor, noted for its lack of competitive performance.
  • Deputy Chairman Anton Gorelkin emphasizes the need for innovation in domestic consoles.
  • Social media reactions vary from surprise to humor regarding Russia's gaming competition.
  • Putin's directive for consoles comes after major companies stopped sales to Russia due to geopolitical issues.

Notable Quotes:

"Elbrus processors are not yet at the stage of development to ensure equal competition with the PS5 and Xbox." - Anton Gorelkin
"I do remember hearing Russia saying they were going to make their own console. I didn't actually expect them to follow through." - Social media user

Conclusion:

The effort to create competitive gaming consoles in Russia faces significant technological hurdles and public skepticism, reflecting broader challenges in the region's tech industry.

item.title: 5 iPhones coming in 2025 and what to expect - India Today
item.description:
5 iPhones Coming in 2025: What to Expect

Publication Date: N/A Source: India Today

The article discusses the upcoming iPhones scheduled for release in 2025, highlighting their expected features and launch timelines.

  • The iPhone SE 4, possibly rebranded as iPhone 16e, is set to launch in March 2025.
  • The new SE model aims to be Apple's most affordable iPhone featuring AI technologies.
  • The iPhone 17 is expected in September 2025, revolutionizing the design with a new camera bump style.
  • The iPhone 17 Air is anticipated to be the thinnest iPhone yet, with specifications akin to the base iPhone 17.
  • The iPhone 17 Pro will maintain a 6.3-inch display but may feature design alterations.
  • iPhone 17 Pro Max will offer enhanced features, including better battery life due to its size.
"The 17 Pro Max will be getting a smaller Dynamic Island than every other model."

Overall, the article provides insight into Apple's future mobile offerings, showcasing innovative design upgrades and affordability efforts.

item.title: Galaxy S25 Ultra rumoured to feature Corning Gorilla Armor 2 with improved anti-reflective coating - India Today
item.description:
Galaxy S25 Ultra Rumored to Feature Corning Gorilla Armor 2 with Enhanced Anti-Reflective Coating

Published On: Jan 3, 2025 By: Aman Rashid

The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra introduced Corning's Gorilla Armor glass with a groundbreaking anti-reflective coating, enhancing visibility outdoors. Rumors suggest that the Galaxy S25 Ultra will continue this trend with Corning’s second-generation Gorilla Glass Armor, offering improved durability and reduced reflections.

  • The Galaxy S24 Ultra set a precedent with its anti-reflective coating, making it the least reflective screen in smartphone history.
  • Reliable leaker Ice Universe claims the S25 Ultra will utilize the new Gorilla Glass Armor, expected to further diminish reflections.
  • This innovation is aimed at improving user experience by saving battery life and enhancing usability in bright conditions.
  • The phone is anticipated to launch on January 22, 2025, with upgraded features including the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and possibly 16GB RAM.
“Less reflection means the screen looks brighter without needing to crank up the brightness levels.”

The continuation of advanced glass technology in the Galaxy S25 Ultra reinforces Samsung's commitment to practical innovations that distinguish its flagship devices.

item.title: HMD Key With 6.52-Inch Screen, 4,000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
item.description:
HMD Key Launched: Affordable Phone with Impressive Specs

Publication Date: Thursday, Source: Gadgets 360

The HMD Key was launched in select global markets, offering budget-friendly features paired with modern technology including a 4G connection and a robust battery.

  • The HMD Key is priced at GBP 59 (about Rs. 6,300).
  • It features a 6.52-inch display with a resolution of 576 x 1,280 pixels.
  • Powered by a Unisoc 9832E chipset, it comes with 2GB of RAM and 32GB of storage.
  • Equipped with an 8MP rear camera and a 5MP front camera.
  • Battery capacity is 4,000mAh with 10W charging support.
“Users will receive two years of quarterly security updates.”

The launch of the HMD Key emphasizes the company's focus on affordable yet capable smartphones for everyday consumers.

item.title: Samsung India Announces ‘Big TV Days’; Elevate the Future of Cinematic Experience with Exciting Offers on AI-Powered Premium TV Range - Samsung Newsroom India
item.description:
Samsung India Launches ‘Big TV Days’ with Exciting Offers on Premium TVs

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Samsung News

Samsung India has announced its ‘Big TV Days’ campaign, offering substantial cashback and other benefits on its premium television models from January 3 to January 31, 2025, to elevate home entertainment experiences across India.

  • Exciting offers include up to 20% cashback, zero down payment, and EMI options up to 30 months.
  • Consumers can avail free Samsung TVs worth up to ₹204,990 and free soundbars worth up to ₹99,990 with select purchases.
  • The campaign is designed to celebrate the New Year and Republic Day season.
  • Samsung emphasizes the use of AI technology in its premium TVs to enhance viewing experiences.
  • The ‘Big TV Days’ includes the Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, OLED, and 4K UHD TV models.
“At Samsung, we are redefining home entertainment with our ‘Big TV Days’ campaign, offering unmatched deals on our premium AI-powered TVs,” said Viplesh Dang, Senior Director, Visual Display Business, Samsung India.

The campaign aims to make advanced AI technology more accessible and elevate the cinematic viewing experience for customers.

item.title: CES 2025: Samsung unveils OLED monitors for gaming, content creation, more - Business Standard
item.description:
Samsung Unveils Innovative OLED Monitors Ahead of CES 2025

Publication Date: January 7, 2025 • Source: News Agency

Samsung has introduced its latest monitor lineup, featuring cutting-edge OLED technology designed for gamers and content creators at the CES 2025 in Las Vegas.

  • New entries include the Odyssey Series, Smart Monitor M9, and ViewFinity series.
  • The Odyssey OLED G8 features a 27-inch 4K display with a 240Hz refresh rate.
  • The Odyssey OLED G6 boasts the world's first OLED panel with a 500Hz refresh rate.
  • The Odyssey 3D offers a 3D experience without glasses using a lenticular lens.
  • The Smart Monitor M9 integrates on-device AI for picture optimization.
  • The ViewFinity S8 is designed for productivity with a 37-inch 4K display.
“The Odyssey OLED G8 offers more detailed and lifelike visuals, enhancing the experience for both gamers and creators.”

In conclusion, Samsung's new OLED monitors are designed to enhance visual experiences for both gaming and content creation, pushing the boundaries of display technology.

item.title: From startup founders to athletes: How India’s angel investor landscape is evolving beyond wealthy individuals | Mint - Mint
item.description:
From startup founders to athletes: How India’s angel investor landscape is evolving beyond wealthy individuals

Publication Date: [Insert Date] Source: Mint

As traditional big-name founders in India’s startup ecosystem reduce their investments, a new class of angel investors, including athletes and young professionals, are emerging in the angel investment landscape.

  • The top three angel investors of 2023 have pulled back from funding in 2024.
  • Athletes are increasingly participating in early-stage funding.
  • This shift reflects a broader trend in the investment landscape in India.
"Sport stars, actors and young professionals are edging their way into angel investment territory"

This evolution in the angel investment landscape highlights changing dynamics in funding sources for startups in India.

item.title: Fitness coach reveals 6 eye-opening things you don’t have to do to lose weight: ‘If you just do cardio…’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Fitness Coach Reveals 6 Eye-Opening Things You Don’t Have to Do to Lose Weight

January 3, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Riva Siggins, a fitness coach, emphasizes that weight loss doesn’t require extreme measures and shares six common misconceptions people should avoid.

  • Skipping meals increases hunger and hinders adherence to a calorie deficit.
  • Labeling foods as good or bad is misleading; moderation is key.
  • Cardio alone is not sufficient; resistance training is crucial for muscle retention.
  • Copying influencers is ineffective; individual factors matter.
  • Training every day without rest can lead to injury and burnout.
  • Carbs are not the enemy; they should make up a significant proportion of daily calories.
“You’re not a bad person for eating a chocolate bar, and if you fit these foods into your deficit calories, you’ll still drop weight.” - Riva Siggins

Riva encourages a balanced approach to diet and exercise, highlighting that proper nutrition and adequate rest are essential for successful weight loss.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes, January 3, 2025, edition: Level up your gameplay completely free - The Financial Express
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes for January 3, 2025

Publication Date: January 3, 2025

Source: Financial Express

Garena Free Fire MAX is a popular battle royale game that has attracted many players, especially in India. The game offers improved graphics and exciting gameplay with a continuous stream of updates and redeem codes.

  • Free Fire MAX provides daily redeem codes unlocking various in-game rewards.
  • Each redeem code is valid for only 24 hours, encouraging quick action from players.
  • This edition includes a list of redeem codes for January 3, 2025.
  • Redeeming codes enhances gameplay, offering exclusive items and competitive advantages.

Redeem codes for January 3, 2025: RDNAFV2KX2CQ, WFYCTK2MYNCK, PSFFTXV5FRDK, FFX4QKNFSM9Y, AYNFFQPXTW9K, FFWCX9TSY2QK, XF4SWKCH6KY4, WFS2Y7NQFV9S, FFX9QS2GWT7C, FXK2NDY5QSMX, FFHSTP7MXNP2, GSQ4FXV9FRKC, NPCQ2FW7PXN2, FYW2FVQ9SZB6, FY9MFW7KFSNN.

To redeem these codes, players should visit reward.ff.garena.com and log in with their accounts. Rewards will appear in their in-game mailboxes within 24 hours if the codes are valid.

item.title: OnePlus 13 cases leak hints at MagSafe like features and fresh materials - India Today
item.description:
OnePlus 13 Cases Leak Hints at MagSafe-like Features and Fresh Materials

Published On: Jan 3, 2025 | Published By: Aman Rashid

The upcoming OnePlus 13 series is set to launch globally on January 7, 2025, showcasing fresh accessories that feature magnetic capabilities, akin to Apple's MagSafe technology, and are compatible with Qi2 wireless charging.

  • OnePlus 13 will launch globally after initial release in China.
  • The series includes magnetic cases that can attach easily and work with various magnetic accessories.
  • Materials used for the cases will be Sandstone, Aramid Fiber, and Wood Grain, familiar to OnePlus fans.
  • These cases will offer compatibility with Qi2 chargers for an efficient charging experience.
  • The introduction of magnetic features represents a shift in the Android accessory market to catch up with Apple's innovations.
“It’s interesting to see how the Android world is catching up with Apple’s MagSafe.”

This new development from OnePlus reflects a growing trend in advanced smartphone accessories, enhancing user convenience and compatibility across devices.

item.title: Magic monkey tale inspires China’s gaming industry to seek blockbuster success - Financial Times
item.description:
Magic monkey tale inspires China’s gaming industry to seek blockbuster success

Publication Date: October 2024

Source: Financial Times

The article discusses the growth of China's video game industry following the massive success of the action role-playing game Black Myth: Wukong. Released by Game Science, the game has sold over 25 million copies and generated significant sales revenue.

  • China's video game industry aims to release more blockbuster titles in 2025.
  • Black Myth: Wukong sold 10 million copies in three days, becoming one of the fastest-selling debuts in history.
  • The game has earned $1.1 billion, with 70% of sales coming from China.
  • It is recognized as China's first major AAA title, marking a shift toward larger, more ambitious projects.
  • The Chinese government is also easing restrictions, having approved nearly 1,300 games in the first 11 months of 2024.
“The success of Black Myth makes developers dare to chase dreams and reach for triple-A projects,” said a gaming developer at a Shenzhen-based studio.

Overall, China’s gaming industry is positioning itself to compete globally with more sophisticated games that reflect authentic cultural narratives.

item.title: Xiaomi 15 Ultra Launch Timeline Revealed: Will It Come To India? - News18
item.description:
Xiaomi 15 Ultra Launch Timeline Revealed: Will It Come To India?

Date: January 03, 2025

Source: News18

Xiaomi is expected to launch the 15 Ultra model in 2025, following the successful introduction of the 14 Ultra model in the Indian market. There have been hints from company president Lu Weibing regarding its release at the Mobile World Congress (MWC) in March.

  • The Xiaomi 15 Ultra is likely to be unveiled on March 2, 2025, at MWC in Barcelona.
  • It will feature the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a variety of premium specifications.
  • Previous models set a precedent, with the Xiaomi 14 Ultra launching at MWC 2024.
“The Xiaomi 15 Ultra would be unveiled at MWC 2025,” - Lu Weibing

The Xiaomi 15 Ultra is anticipated to have features such as 90W wired charging, satellite communication capabilities, and impressive camera specifications, including a 200MP large-aperture periscope telephoto sensor.

In conclusion, the Xiaomi 15 Ultra is generating significant anticipation for its potential launch in India, building on the success of previous models and the global market's demand for innovative smartphone features.
